mapper.select: SELECT calendar.calendar_id AS calendarId, calendar.title AS title, calendar.content AS content, calendar.user_id AS userId, user.username AS userName, calendar.start_date AS startDate, calendar.end_date AS endDate, calendar.group_id AS groupId, status AS status FROM calendar LEFT JOIN user ON calendar.user_id = user.user_id WHERE view_status = 0;
mapper.insert: insert into calendar (calendar_id, title, content, user_id, start_date, end_date,group_id) VALUES (#{calendarId},#{title},#{content},#{userId},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{groupId})
mapper.update: UPDATE calendar SET view_status = 1 WHERE calendar_id = #{calendarId} AND user_id = #{userId}
